title.rendered: Air Busan Airline in Busan, South Korea

content.rendered:
Air Busan is a low-cost airline based in Busanjin-gu, Busan, South Korea. It is a subsidiary of Asiana Airlines. The airline began its operation in 2007 as Busan International Airlines Company it launched service in October 2008.

Air Busan is South Korea’s third-largest low-cost airline, carrying 4.5 million domestic and 3.6 million international passengers in 2018.

Air Busan Contact Address, Phone, Opening hours and Website

Air Busan Address : 108, Gonghangjinip-ro, Gangseo-gu, Busan, Korea

Phone number : 051-974-3114

Fleet size: 24

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A321-200
  • Airbus A321neo
  • Airbus A321LR

Air Busan Baggage Allowance

View Air Busan Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Traveling while Pregnant Women in Air Busan

  • Pregnancy between 32 and 36 weeks you must submitted medical certificate

For more details: https://en.airbusan.com/content/common/service/customer/pregnantWoman

Traveling with Pets

  • Pets are allowed in Air Busan (dogs, cats, and birds), please apply through the reservation center in advance.

For more details: https://en.airbusan.com/content/common/service/customer/animal

Queries handled by Air Busan Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Busan office in South Korea Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Busan office in South Korea: (click on the stars below)
